articles.author: Hannah Dailey
articles.title: Taylor Swift's 'Tortured Poets Department': Records Broken - Billboard
articles.description: Taylor Swift's 'The Tortured Poets Department' has arrived. Here's every record the album has broken since its release.
articles.content: Taylor Swift was gunning for a truly epic release week long before The Tortured Poets Department actually dropped, with the pop star surprising fans by unleashing 31 new songs — as opposed to the pre… [+3228 chars]
